item.title: Rails app with Azure Entra-ID authentication
item.description:
This post 1 demonstrates how to use Azure Entra-ID for authentication. According to What is Microsoft Entra ID?,

Microsoft Entra ID is a cloud-based identity and access management service that your employees can use to access external resources.

item.title: PDF to text conversion
item.description: There is once in a while the need to extract pure text from PDF files. This blog shows some attempts to do it with dot, with ruby, and with command line utitilites.
